author: Tim Daniels
title: Video: Tom Brady, Russell Wilson, More Star in NFL 'Stay Home, Stay Strong' PSA
description: Tom Brady ,  Russell Wilson ,  Brett Favre , Ray Lewis and more  NFL  stars of past and present were featured in a public service announcement entitled "Stay Home, Stay Strong" amid the  coronavirus  pandemic...
content:
Christian Petersen/Getty Images
Tom Brady, Russell Wilson, Brett Favre, Ray Lewis and more NFL stars of past and present were featured in a public service announcement entitled "Stay Home, Stay Strong" amid the coronavirus pandemic.
